headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Hard Mode Event: The First Dose Continues
content:
Help Dax and the Fooliganz climb the pile of undesirables known as Los Santos’ criminal underworld in the First Dose Hard Mode Event to collect an array of rare items, including the Green Fooliganz Livery for the MTL Brickade 6x6, the Safari Ranger Livery for the Överflöd Entity MT, and more.

Plus reap Double Rewards in First Dose Missions all this week.
